top.title: Trump warns Iran 'time is running out' for nuclear deal as US military builds up in Gulf
top.summary: Tehran says it will “respond like never before” if necessary to what the US president says is a "massive Armada" moving towards Iran.

top.title: 'Don't take us to a hospital': Iran protesters treated in secret to avoid arrest
top.summary: Wounded demonstrators tell the BBC they are relying on medics willing to risk their own safety by treating them at their homes.

top.title: China trip will bring benefits to UK, Starmer insists, ahead of Xi meeting
top.summary: The prime minister seeks to strengthen ties with China but faces fierce criticism from opponents at home.

top.title: Iran's internet is returning - but not for everyone
top.summary: The country cut off internet access on 8 January following a government crackdown on protesters.

top.title: Government offers UK adults free AI training for work
top.summary: The online lessons give advice on things such as how to prompt chatbots or complete admin tasks.

top.title: Amazon confirms 16,000 job cuts after accidental email
top.summary: The technology giant confirmed the redundancies hours after it told staff in an email sent in error.

title.#text: Spotify says it paid out $11 billion in royalties in 2025
Process Zero II will let you do a little processing, if you want
Apple’s noise-canceling AirPods 4 are down to one of their best prices to date
